title: Glasswall Halo
description: Glasswall Halo is built upon powerful cloud-native architecture using scalable Kubernetes. CDR technology removes potential threats from unknown files in less than a second, without compromising the files contents.

title: Glasswall Halo - ICAP Server
description: ICAP (Internet Content Adaptation Protocol) is designed to delegate tasks like virus scanning and content filtering to dedicated servers.

title: Glasswall REST APIs
description: Glasswall APIs to deliver zero-trust CDR file processing at scale.

title: Glasswall Meteor
description: Glasswall Meteor provides zero-trust file protection in an easy to install desktop application. Leveraging Electron, React and Typescript.

title: jdmcserver
description: A stripped down EC2 virtual machine capable of running a Minecraft server for 2 dollars a month, hosted in AWS.

title: CV
description: This page is actually a React/Webpack static site hosted on GitHub Pages. Feel free to suggest improvements or even open a Pull Request.
